page.title: 09RELIGION IN DOVE HOLES
page.content: Most people worship at the Church of England & Methodist church though a few attend the Roman Catholic & Pente- costal Church in Buxton. During the survey l person was found to be a Moslem. Mr. Willey,Methodist minister of Chapel & Dove Holes since l984 has been a minister for 32 years. After an engineering apprenticeship,he worked with Lancaster bombers during World War 2 & became a prisoner.Dove Holes Methodist church after associations with Buxton,Macclesfield & Bradwell was finally included in the Whaley Bridge circuit in l944.This consists of Whaley Bridge,Fernilee.Combs, Bagshaw,Dove Holes,Kettleshume,White- hough,Chapel,Chinley & White Knowle. Mr. Willey is paid only 4 times a year the money coming from the churches.
